url.description: The URL of the website to screenshot. Must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL.

selector.description: Optional: CSS selector to screenshot a specific element instead of the viewport (e.g., '.header', '#main-content', 'div.match-card'). If omitted, captures the viewport or full page.

fullPage.description: If true, captures the full scrollable page. If false (default), captures only the visible viewport. Set to true when you need to see all content on the page.
